*********
Tutorials
*********

QuLTRA provides a series of tutorials to help users get started with the library. These tutorials cover various aspects of using QuLTRA, from basic circuit modeling to advanced features.

Some tutorials use Qiskit Metal and Ansys; in this case, make sure both are installed correctly.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 0
   :caption: List of Tutorials:

   ./tutorial/Basics.ipynb
   ./tutorial/Qubit_resonator.ipynb
   ./tutorial/JJ_array.ipynb
   ./tutorial/Exploiting_higher_modes.ipynb
   ./tutorial/Intrinsic_Purcell_filter.ipynb
   ./tutorial/Coupling_qubits_to_feedline.ipynb
